Name: New Orleans Mule
Ingredients: 30 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.
Review: A spicy, full-flavoured taste of the South.
History: A detailed history of the Moscow Mule cocktail , of which this drink is a variant, can be found on our page.
Nutrition: One serving of New Orleans Mule contains 252 calories
